description:
At Brown & Barron LLC, those living in Baltimore and all across Maryland will receive the guidance of a legal team committed to justice and to their clients' future best interests. As a leading personal injury law firm in our area, we provide support to individuals who have suffered physically, emotionally and financially as a result of the negligence or recklessness of a drug company, doctor, health care facility or nursing home. We fight for meaningful results in each case we take.

Our team of attorneys is proud to speak for those who cannot speak for themselves. With over 75 years of combined experience, we know what it takes to secure appropriate compensation for our Maryland clients. We offer aggressive representation and compassionate support in personal injury and wrongful death cases pertaining to the following:

• Nursing home negligence or abuse
• Medical malpractice
• Dangerous drugs or medical devices
• Birth injury
• Brain injury

We understand the toll that these experiences can have on a client and his or her family. Our law firm works closely with each client, taking the time to understand individual concerns and remaining in communication throughout the entire case. Our lawyers are results-oriented, always protecting the best interests of our clients whether in the courtroom or in negotiations.

Brown & Barron LLC is proud to offer our prospective clients free initial case evaluations. If you believe you may have a case against a drug company or care provider, you can contact us by phone or through our law firm's website today for the help and support you need.
